term.title: chemical functionality

item.text: Ability of functional groups present within a polymer or polymer network to participate in chemical reactions.

notes.item: The chemical functionality of a network formed by a sol-gel process from a precursor such as (RO)3Si–CH=CH2 is that of the vinyl group.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1804 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
